item.title: Mini Honeymoon
item.description: Every few years, for the past 14 years, my wife and I go on a mini honeymoon - an expensive hotel suite with room service from Friday evening until noon Monday. We usually left the kids with grandparents. This would be the first time we’d left our kids on their own, leaving our 13-year-old son, Matt to take care of our 9-year-old twins, Mark and Mary. We weren’t worried about them.
